name: Torrent Tycoon [v0.1beta]
description:
Welcome to Torrent Tycoon!

In this game you can create your own torrent tracker, and bring it to worldwide fame!

Opportunities:

Creating a torrent tracker.

Site improvements.

And much more..

----

The game is under active development.

If you have any ideas or suggestions to improve the game, write them in the comments!

Thanks for your attention!
